step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
You made a good fist while pushing down and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale here.
As you stretch your arms back overhead, focus on exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Continue to relax and exhale as you return to the starting position.
Great job completing the first repetition! Keep up the good work.
For the second repetition, ensure you maintain a comfortable posture and stretch your arm overhead with fingers open.
You're doing well making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale during this phase.
As you extend your arms overhead, focus on a smooth exhale and muscle relaxation.
Continue to exhale and relax as you bring your arms back down.
Excellent work finishing the second repetition! You're performing the exercise well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to inhale as you make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades, then exhale and relax as you stretch your arms overhead. Keep up the good work with your lymphatic drainage.
